name: band-together
description: A band companion app for musicians

scripts.start: bunx concurrently "cd api && bun start" "cd client && bun start"
scripts.preinstall: cd shared && bun install && cd ../api && bun install && cd ../client && bun install && cd ../db && bun install
scripts.typecheck: bun run typecheck:client && bun run typecheck:api
scripts.build:preview: cd client && eas build --platform android --profile preview
